meta.name: Message Logger
meta.description: Keeps deleted messages visible and stores edit history so you never miss what was said.

logDeletes.description: Keep deleted messages visible instead of removing them.

logEdits.description: Store previous versions of edited messages.

inlineEdits.description: Show edit history directly under the message.

showEditDiffs.description: Highlight text differences between edit versions.

ignoreBots.description: Do not log messages from bots.

ignoreSelf.description: Do not log your own messages.

ignoreUsers.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to ignore.

ignoreChannels.description: Comma-separated list of channel IDs to ignore.

ignoreGuilds.description: Comma-separated list of guild IDs to ignore.

collapseDeleted.description: Group deleted messages similar to blocked messages.
